section.title: ready
section.para: The ready instruction sends the ID of a new connection and marks the beginning of the interactive phase of a new, successful connection. The ID sent is a completely arbitrary string, and has no standard format. It must be unique from all existing and future connections and may not match the name of any installed protocol support.

listitem.para: An arbitrary, unique identifier for the current connection. This identifier must be unique from all existing and future connections, and may not match the name of any installed protocol support (such as "vnc" or "rdp").
